comments.comment: I love how once every couple years, he returns to this game out of nowhere

People always say, "I miss old Pewdiepie."

This video proves he never left.
The way Felix gets in character with this game gives me life

Pewds: "turning into a psycho"
Fans: "keep it up we love you"
I haven't laughed this hard in a while. The sheer absurdity of the game is solid gold.
This is quality pewdiepie gameplay, he’s just as hilarious as he’s always been. Love this content but I hope he keeps doing what he loves!
This kind of content brings me back to a time when this man was a maniac in every video ahah
imagine this was someone’s first pewdiepie video they’d probably think he’s insane
This looks so cathartic, and I love Felix's humor and pure joy while dismembering/kissing/sniffing the NPCs.
I always like to imagine Marzia sitting in one corner of the room, silent, just watching him recording this.

8 minutes and ten seconds of pure chaos, I died laughing lmao, almost choked on my dinner. I miss laughing like this, so loud that my parents have come to my room just to tell me to keep it down. Thank you Pewds, you made my day!
I can't help but to lose my mind laughing when 2017 PewDiePie makes a guest appearance

Now we know why we don’t see this type of content anymore. 
He’s being considerate about under channels. He’s too powerful in this form.
This is the single most derailed bit of editing I've ever seen in a Pewdiepie vid.  And I was dying laughing the whole time.  I'm really into this new chapter

PewDiePie: "let's pick another weapon, this one's too OP"
proceeds to pick a fucking lightsaber
7:21 this genuine excitement turned my day from bad to good. Thank you

The crawling and snarling added approximately 90 minutes to my lifespan. 

Also, Sive did some next-level editing on this, so let us thank him for his hard work, and pray that Pewds gets him a window in his dungeon or something.
This game truly brings out the beast from within. In Pewds' case, he brings out his inner viking
Alternate title: 8 minutes and 10 seconds of Pewds being a psychopath in VR
This video is the 1st time I've laughed in days. Truly appreciate the 2 camera perspective of Felix wallowing in the floor while stabbing npcs in the c00ter. floor gang!

Gfuel: We have a new formula, but don't put in more than 2 scoops.
Felix: They didn't state the size of the scoops.
10 seconds later: 2:53
Felix's personality and energy changes a lot when he's standing up compared when he's in his chair.
Seeing pewds genuinely having fun is the best kind of content.
This has got to be one of the funniest Pewdiepie videos. I was laughing like crazy for 8 minutes straight
Totally missed pewds playing this and does anyone remember when he used to say "knees" definitely makes our day better

pewdiepie in this video:
• Says something is too op and then grabs an even stronger weapon
• acts like a maniac
•has knee and foot obsession
• crawls on the ground muttering and growling to himself
The sheer amount of memes Sive has in stock is admirable
i’m sorry but this video is so funny. like definitely his funniest video to me. i’ve watched it twice
This has 2016-2017 Pewdiepie vibes, and I love it. Haven’t laughed this hard in a long time. The editing was… chefs kiss

Felix: "You know what, this is too OP, I'm not gonna use this"
Immediately takes out Light Saber
Swedish viking beast beating the shit outta the npcs for 8 minutes straight
5:46 I appreciate the Black and White reference
marzia should do a series where she just records what it sounds like in other rooms during felix making his vids lmao
Pewds energy, the editing, it’s all so on point. I forgot how chaotic he gets with VR XD
Ahh the 2017 pewdiepie memories are coming back. Could watch this for hours lmao
This made me laugh so hard! Felix should do content like this more often
This feels like good ol 2017-2018 all over again. I love Pewds' VR playthrough. It's very entertaining.
This is my favorite video in a LONG time. Laughed the whole time & reminded me of YouTube’s golden age

Pewds: "You know what, this is too op. I'm not going to use this."
Also Pewds: grabs a lightsaber
This is the best content felix does, makes me love so hard everytime.
This is the best Pewdiepie video I’ve seen in a while. Need more of this. Just play games that you enjoy and keep that chaotic energy.
8 minutes full of moments with no intro and just having a time of his life, love it.
The editing style, either sive is cracked out his mind and feeling refreshed after the break or theres a new editor either way great vid

“This is too op, let’s try something else”

switches from club to a laser gun
I love how throughout the game, he breathes more and more heavily.
LOOOOL this was so hysterical. Laughed my ass off alone, legit.

How can one man control the whole community?
Pewds is just a god.
Keep up the work
This video has single-handedly reinvigorated my interest in virtual reality
This would be very scary if Felix had this power in those times.
Whoever edited this video, well done, just outstanding. Pewds with blades and sorcery is already funny enough but the editing had me dying the entire video. Just completely hilarious start to finish
These VR videos are always my favorite. So cursed, so insane, so fun.
The “don’t worry child” then tosses off into the well…. The part where you’re stabbing knees… I was rolling this whole episode  thank you for this!
Props to Sive ,he really made everyone's day.
This felt like a fever dream and i loved every second of it
lol both pewds and sive are popping off after their well deserved break. the energy as well as the editing felt really fresh :)
this feels so unreal, its been so long since ive seen pewdiepie with so much energy LOL
This is EPIC Felix, at least I can enjoy your video before sleeping.
This is top tier Pewdiepie

I think it would be amazing to see Pewds in full body tracking VR since this game supports it. I can just imagine him kicking the enemies or his weird poses actually having a substantial effect on the gameplay being hilarious.
I literally can't stop laughing and smiling the whole time im watching this I need more of this
6:59 that was the funniest part, this video felt different and I kinda liked it, this was amazing Pewds and thank you for another great video.

No intro, nothing. Just pure chaos. 

I love it.
Haven't seen pewds this happy in a long time
The editing definitely made this video so much better, all the memes thrown in there makes a laugh more common! Good job Sive!
felix and sive popping off with the energy and edits feels like a fever dream and i love it
The editing on this made it perfect, love it
Just once I want to see Marzia just walk in on him playing this and getting the exterior view of him just acting like an idiot.
When he's running, I can't can't stop thinking of "I'm fast as fuck!"
It always comes back to the “knees. Knees. Knees!” And I couldn’t be happier. These are always some of the funniest gameplay
This is just funny every time. Haven't had a good laugh in such a long time.
i imagine marzia just coming in the room while he's massacring someone and thinking .."i'm married to a psychopath"
I have a decent amount of hours in this game. After putting some of my friends in this game I can confirm that people will do the weirdest shit in simulations as they know there's no consequence.
The way he crawls on the ground and says “knees” is hilarious
I know it was the very begin but 0:09 but as he said "if anyone of you moves, she dies" as he's stabbing her lifeless neck I died laughing lmfao

0:10
Skyrim Guards : (rapidly approaching him)
Felix : "Hey, if anyone moves, she dies !" 
Also Felix : (repeatedly thrusts his dagger into the dead woman's neck)
He's taking revenge at everyone by cutting of their legs since he doesn't have them himself
Pewds looks like a kid at an arcade that thinks everything he’s doing is real lol
God the chaotic violence is making me laugh so hard
Let's take a moment to appreciate how on-point the editing is.
We need a full hour of this  It's too good man!
The sight of you crawling on your back stabbing people in VR is just hilarious
The last like 5 seconds of it are iconic lol
I needed this laughter, thank you Felix. Laughed so hard at this video it's unreal. Glad to see you're enjoying yourself again, whatever you're doing - keep doing it and taking care of yourself.
I could watch this all day. 8 minutes just isn’t enough
3:43 When floorganger has to get a chair.
This is the most chaotic Felix has been in a while
Man seeing him genuinely having fun with this game and the mods just brings out a huge laugh out of me.

I was getting so bored during january i rewatched pewds' blades and sorcery playlist and look what we got here. Thank you bro i loved this series!
It reminds me of you in the later stages of getting over it.
God I love pewdiepie
Laughed for the entire video  this is the old pewds showing through
Black and white, Flintstones, and drunken master? Take my money
Man I was literally smiling and laughing during every sec of the video. Absolutely love it
i love his vr stuff it's one of the rare times he really let's his edgy humour come out
The VR psychopath pewds is back! I've watched the other ones a long time ago and nothing changed, still chaotic as hell. Love it so much, made me laugh as always
I wonder if Felix ever isekai-d to the fantasy world, they'd think they had summoned a demon...
my mum yelled at me for laughing too hard haha
I love how we get absolutely no context whatsoever for whatever the hell is going on
I haven't laughed so much watching game play for a while, thanks Felix
Pewdiepie is a legend
Sive with the gold editing and Pewds just having the time of his life absolutely banger of a vid
Can we just appreciate how pewdiepie never fails to assault vr characters
You playing this games gives me much joy, fucking laugh the whole way through  please never stop making videos, didn't even realise how much I missed them! Much love bruuuhhh
I love to see how this game ALWAYS brings out this man's inner sociopath, it's amazing
I love how despite playing this game 2 years ago, Pewds still has an obsession with legs.
Imagine being a medieval soldier fighting a lunatic and then suddenly he pulls out a glock out of no where and starts shooting at you.
Looks like the time off has done Felix some good. I'm loving this energy.
This. this is pure art at its finest! I have tears in my eyes! This was just beautiful! Thank you Lord Pewdiepie, thank for this!
Who edited this it was so good especially the wipe out clip when the dude got slapped by that large slappa weapon
I love seeing grown men get this excited
the game, the energy, the editing: it's all perfect
3:48 Wow! Mandalorian Season 3 is looking good!
i laughed so hard at the end. keep it up felix!
this be the funniest vid i saw in a while...
I haven't laughed this hard in years. Thanks man.
I feel an incomprehensible need to see footage of this without the vr
Pls do more of these, I haven't laughed hard in forever. My face hurts
Pewds definitely is snorting GFuel before videos
4:26 men in the 1950s when their wife slightly overcooked the meatloaf
